English: Choose the BIOS image to use. The official BIOS must be provided by the user. Using a non-official (or builtin) BIOS might result in incompatibility problems with some games. Best results are to be achieved with the official Nintendo BIOS.
Chinese: 选择要使用的BIOS映像。官方BIOS必须由用户提供。使用非官方(或内置)BIOS可能会导致某些游戏出现不兼容问题。最好的结果是通过官方的任天堂BIOS来实现。

English: Choose whether to boot the BIOS before the game or not. There's not much difference in either modes.
Chinese: 选择是否在游戏前启动BIOS。两种模式都没有太大区别。

English: Skip frames to avoid audio buffer under-run (crackling). Improves performance at the expense of visual smoothness. 'Auto' skips frames when advised by the frontend. 'Manual' utilises the 'Frameskip Threshold (%)' setting.
Chinese: 跳过帧以避免音频缓冲区不足(爆裂)。以牺牲视觉平滑度为代价提高性能。当前端建议时，‘自动’跳过帧。‘自动(阈值)’使用‘跳帧阈值(%)’设置。‘固定间隔’利用‘跳帧间隔’设置。

English: When 'Frameskip' is set to 'Manual', specifies the audio buffer occupancy threshold (percentage) below which frames will be skipped. Higher values reduce the risk of crackling by causing frames to be dropped more frequently.
Chinese: 当“帧跳过”设置为“手动”时，指定音频缓冲区占用阈值（百分比），低于该阈值将跳过帧。较高的值会导致框架更频繁地掉落，从而降低破裂的风险。

English: When 'Frameskip' is set to 'Fixed Interval', the value set here is the number of frames omitted after a frame is rendered - i.e. '0' = 60fps, '1' = 30fps, '2' = 15fps, etc.
Chinese: 当‘跳帧’设置为‘固定间隔’时，此处设置的值是渲染帧后忽略的帧数，即‘0’=60fps，‘1’=30fps，’2’=15fps等。

English: Adjusts output colors to match the display of real GBA hardware.
Chinese: 调整输出颜色以匹配实际GBA硬件的显示。

English: Simulates LCD ghosting effects by performing a 50:50 mix of the current and previous frames. Required for correct operation when playing games that exploit LCD ghosting for transparency effects (F-Zero, the Boktai series, etc.).
Chinese: 通过对当前帧和前一帧进行50:50的混合来模拟LCD重影效果。在玩利用LCD重影获得透明效果的游戏(F-Zero、Boktai系列等)时，需要正确操作。

English: Choose the data format used for cartridge save files. 'gpSP' can be used for compatibility with the stand-alone version of gpSP. 'libretro' provides better integration with the frontend.
Chinese: 选择用于盒式磁带保存文件的数据格式。‘gpSP’可用于与独立版本的gpSP兼容。‘libretro’提供了与前端的更好集成。

English: Dynamically recompile CPU instructions to native instructions. Greatly improves performance, but may reduce accuracy.
Chinese: 动态地将CPU指令重新编译为本机指令。极大地提高了性能，但可能会降低准确性。

English: Specify the repeat interval (in frames) when holding down the Turbo A/B buttons.
Chinese: 指定按下连发A/B按钮时的重复间隔(以帧为单位)。

English: Configure processor overclocking and emulation accuracy parameters affecting low-level performance and compatibility.
Chinese: 配置影响低级别性能和兼容性的处理器超频和仿真精度参数。

English: Specify which region the system is from. 'PAL' is 50hz, 'NTSC' is 60hz. Games will run faster or slower than normal if the incorrect region is selected.
Chinese: 指定系统来自哪个区域。'PAL制式为50赫兹，NTSC制式为60赫兹。如果选择了不正确的区域，游戏将比正常情况下运行得更快或更慢。

English: Enable a low pass audio filter to soften treble artifacts and mimic the 'bassy' sound of original SNES hardware.
Chinese: 启用低通音频滤波器以软化高音伪影，并模仿原始SNES硬件的“低音”声音。

English: Specify the cut-off frequency of the low pass audio filter. A higher value increases the perceived 'strength' of the filter, since a wider range of the high frequency spectrum is attenuated.
Chinese: 指定低通音频滤波器的截止频率。较高的值会增加滤波器的感知“强度”，因为高频频谱的较宽范围会衰减。

English: Many games for the SNES suffered from slowdown due to the weak main CPU. This option helps allievate that at the cost of possible bugs. COMPATIBLE: Reduce slowdown but keep as much game compatibility as much as possible. MAX: Reduce slowdown as much as possible but will break more games.
Chinese: SNES的许多游戏由于主CPU不足而速度减慢。这个选项有助于以可能的错误为代价来缓解这种情况。兼容：减少速度减慢，但尽可能保持游戏兼容性。极限：尽可能减少减速，但会破坏更多的游戏。

English: Increases number of sprites that can be drawn simultaneously on screen. Reduces flickering in games.
Chinese: 增加可以在屏幕上同时绘制的精灵数量。减少游戏中的闪烁。
更改网络游戏链接 (多人)

English: Selects palette used for colorizing Game Boy games when 'GB Colorization' is set to 'Internal', or when 'GB Colorization' is set to 'Auto' and game has no pre-defined SGB/GBC palette. 'GB' palettes mimic the display of original Game Boy hardware. 'GBC' palettes are identical to the built-in presets of the Game Boy Color. 'SGB' palettes are identical to the built-in presets of the Super Game Boy.
Chinese: 选择 'GB 色彩化' 时用于彩色游戏的调色板。'GB 色彩化' 设置为 '内部'， 或者当“GB 色彩化”设置为“自动”且游戏没有预定义的 SGB/GBC 调色板。 'GB'的调色板模拟GameBoy硬件的显示。'GBC' 色板与GameBoy颜色的内置预设相同。 'SGB'调色板与SuperGameBoy的内置预设相同。
使用官方引导程序（需重启生效）

English: Force core to use NTSC, PAL or Dendy region timings.
Chinese: 强制核心使用NTSC、PAL或Dendy区域的时序。
游戏精灵附加组件（需要重启）

English: Enable emulation of a Game Genie add-on cartridge, allowing cheat codes to be entered when launching games. The Game Genie ROM file 'gamegenie.nes' must be present in the frontend's system directory. Does not apply to FDS or arcade content.
Chinese: 启用游戏精灵附加卡带的模拟功能，允许在启动游戏时输入作弊码。游戏精灵ROM文件“gamegenie.nes”必须位于前端的系统目录中。不适用于FDS或街机内容。

English: Show advanced system options and tweaks.
Chinese: 显示高级系统选项和调整。

English: Show advanced sound options and tweaks.
Chinese: 显示高级音频选项和调整。

English: Removes 8 pixel overscan from all sides of the screen.
Chinese: 从屏幕的四边移除8像素的过扫描。

English: Removes pixels from left side of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: 从屏幕左侧移除像素，以模拟标准CRT电视上的过扫描效果。

English: Removes pixels from right side of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: 从屏幕右侧移除像素，以模拟标准CRT电视上的过扫描效果。

English: Removes pixels from the top of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: Removes pixels from the top of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.

English: Removes pixels from the bottom of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: Removes pixels from the bottom of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.

English: Choose from pre-generated palettes, a custom 64x3 palette from file or raw format (needs to use a nes-decoder shader).
Chinese: Choose from pre-generated palettes, a custom 64x3 palette from file or raw format (needs to use a nes-decoder shader).

English: Blargg's NTSC filters are used to replicate RF, Composite, S-Video, and RGB cable signals.
Chinese: Blargg's NTSC filters are used to replicate RF, Composite, S-Video, and RGB cable signals.

English: Enable higher quality sound. Increases performance requirements.
Chinese: Enable higher quality sound. Increases performance requirements.

English: Apply a low pass audio filter to simulate the 'muted' sound of the NES when connected to a television via the RF modulator.
Chinese: Apply a low pass audio filter to simulate the 'muted' sound of the NES when connected to a television via the RF modulator.

English: Enable a fake stereo sound effect by delaying the right audio channel when upmixing the mono signal output from the NES.
Chinese: Enable a fake stereo sound effect by delaying the right audio channel when upmixing the mono signal output from the NES.

English: Simulates the sound from famiclones that have the pulse wave channels duty cycle bits reversed.
Chinese: Simulates the sound from famiclones that have the pulse wave channels duty cycle bits reversed.

English: Enables or disables pulse wave generator audio output 1.
Chinese: Enables or disables pulse wave generator audio output 1.

English: Enables or disables pulse wave generator audio output 2.
Chinese: Enables or disables pulse wave generator audio output 2.

English: Enables or disables triangle wave generator audio output.
Chinese: Enables or disables triangle wave generator audio output.

English: Enables or disables noise generator audio output.
Chinese: Enables or disables noise generator audio output.

English: Enables or disables delta modulation channel audio output.
Chinese: Enables or disables delta modulation channel audio output.

English: Repeat rate of turbo buttons in frames.
Chinese: Repeat rate of turbo buttons in frames.

English: Selects device to use for Zapper games.
Chinese: Selects device to use for Zapper games.
